meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Pam Jones-Pigott Reggie LaFond Ari Stern Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6006.

td.p: Pam Jones-Pigott, a farmers' market coordinator from Pflugerville, Texas
Reggie LaFond, a business analyst from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Ari Stern, a mathematician from San Diego, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,201)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
AriWho was Sousa?
$4,000
ReggieWho is Souza?
$5,000
PamWho is Sousa?
$4,000
(John Philip) Sousa')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1886 he published his first book, "The Trumpet and Drum", an instructional handbook with 8 compositions')

tr.td: In 1886 he published his first book, "The Trumpet and Drum", an instructional handbook with 8 compositions

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
